name: Dragon's Defense v0.8
description:
CONTROLS

  • A,D, or Left, Right Arrow Keys to move.
  • E to fire.
  • Click on the shop to buy upgrades.

A small project I have been working on for the past two weeks in Unity. One of my first somewhat big projects in Unity and is still in development.

Any feedback you have for this game please let me know in the comments!
